alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 3:31PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Juab... southwestern Salt Lake...northwestern Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 329 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Vernon, or 25 miles southeast of Dugway English Village, moving northeast at 35 mph. Additional thunderstorms are located across the Rush Valley. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Lehi, Herriman, Eagle Mountain, Bluffdale, Cedar Fort, Vernon, Ophir, Camp Williams, Tooele Army Depot, Tooele Army Depot South, Bingham Canyon Mine, Utah Lake, Saratoga Springs, Eureka, Stockton, Rush Valley, Fairfield, Faust and Lofgreen. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 281 and 284. US Route 6 between mile markers 137 and 145. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for central and northern Utah.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
